Package ViewLayer.Screens.LaunchScr

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CarSelectionPanel
    Uses a JPanel to display user selectable car images.
    KeyBoardLayoutLabel
    A simple JLabel containing a keyboard layout image for the specific player.
    LaunchScreen
    A pre-game configuration screen allowing the player(s) to select car(s) and a map.
    MapSelectionLabel
    Builds on a JLabel to display a thumbnail of a selectable map on the launch screen.
    MapSelectionPanel
    Uses a JPanel to display user selectable maps with their names and thumbnail image.
